unittitle_ssm: Lower East Side - Bluefields Sister City Project Records
abstract_ssm: The Lower East Side - Bluefields Sister City Project began in 1985 as a solidarity effort by residents of the Lower East Side, when they paired with Barrio Nueva York, a community of 1,000 in Bluefields, Nicaragua. The collection consists of administrative files, including grant applications, contacts, press clippings, and publicity information.
corpname_ssm: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
